The wikitext parser of CeJS MediaWiki module parses wikitext and generating a Array, including additional properties.

Here shows some examples. These results are generated by parsed = CeL.wiki.parse(wikitext), and then you may use parsed.each(type, token=>{ /* ... */ }); to traversal all tokens.

italic:''italic''
bold:'''bold'''
bold italics:'''''bold italics'''''
switch:__TOC__
convert:-{不轉換}-
convert with variety 語言變體:-{zh-hans:简体字;zh-hant:繁體字}-
link:[[page title]]
link with namespace:[[Talk:page title]]
link with display text:[[page title|display text]]
link with anchor:[[page title#anchor text|display text]]
file:[[file:file name]]
link to file:[[:file:file name|name]]
category:[[category:category name]]
link to category:[[:category:category name|name]]
external link:[https://example.com]
external link display text:[https://example.com display text]
template:{{t}}
template with parameters:{{t|p_a=va| p_b = vb |p1| p2 }}
magic words:{{PAGENAME}}
function:{{ucfirst:function}}
single tag:
tag:bold tag
tag with style:tag with style
comment tag:nowiki
comment:
hr: a ---- b
section title:== section title ==
pre: text pre text text 2
# list: # list item 1 # list item 2
; list: ; dt : dd
talk list: : talk 1 :: reply
list inside list: * list item a *# li1 *# li2 * list item b
table 1: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Header 1 !! Header 2 |- | Text 1 || Text 1 |}
table 2: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="color:#fff" |+ Caption text |- ! Header 1 !! Header 2 |- | style="color:#aaa" | Text 1-1 || Text 1-2 |- | Text 2-1 || Text 2-2 |}
